text: Razgrad Province is a province in northeastern Bulgaria. The capital city is also named Razgrad. ==Municipalities== The Razgrad province has seven municipalities. The following table shows the names of each municipality, the main town or village (towns are shown in bold), and the population of each as of 2009. Municipality Pop. Town/Village Pop. Bulgarian National Statistical Institute - Bulgarian towns in 2009 „pop-stat.mashke.org“ Bulgarian National Statistical Institute – Bulgarian Settlements 1000–5000 inhabitants – December 2009 Isperih 22,916 Isperih 9,017 Kubrat 20,198 Kubrat 8,118 Loznitsa 9,732 Loznitsa 2,409 Razgrad 54,720 Razgrad 34,592 Samuil 7,522 Samuil 1,543 Tsar Kaloyan 6,314 Tsar Kaloyan 3,856 Zavet 11,338 Zavet 3,371 ==References== Category:Provinces of Bulgaria
title: Razgrad Province
